short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate video and audio download url for Lily Class.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can detect all your courses of Lily Class. You can click the course to generate  files of video and audio download urls. Then you can use some m3u8 downloader tool to download them.
